articles.title: Renowned Plant-Based Physician Dr John McDougall Dies Aged 77 - Plant Based News
articles.description: Dr John McDougall, the renowned physician known for advocating for low fat vegan diets, has died aged 77, his family have announced
articles.content:
Dr John McDougall, the renowned author and physician known for his advocacy of low fat plant-based diets, has died aged 77.
